getMainFragmentAdapter().Description: Returns an instance of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#BrowseFragment#MainFragmentAdapter_E@ that @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#BrowseFragment_E@ would use to communicate with the target fragment.

ClassDesc: use @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#BrowseSupportFragment_E@ Interface to be implemented by all fragments for providing an instance of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#BrowseFragment#MainFragmentAdapter_E@. Both @B_android#support#v17#leanback#app#RowsFragment_E@ and custom fragment provided against @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PageRow_E@ will need to implement this interface.
